alert.note: Alert for Butte; Northern Foot Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 09 at 3:38PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Butte and northern Lawrence Counties through 430 PM MDT... At 338 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 6 miles northwest of Arpan, or 16 miles northeast of Belle Fourche, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Belle Fourche Reservoir around 345 PM MDT. Arpan around 355 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Newell and Nisland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
